title.ja: Tenkousaki no Seiso Karen na Bishoujo ga, Mukashi Danshi to Omotte Issho ni Asonda Osananajimi datta Ken

altTitles.ja: 転校先の清楚可憐な美少女が、昔男子と思って一緒に遊んだ幼馴染だった件

altTitles.en: The Neat and Beautiful Girl at My New School is My Childhood Friend Who I Used to Play With Thinking She Was a Boy

altTitles.zh-hk: 我在轉校後遇到的清純可愛美少女，是我曾認為是男孩子並一塊玩耍過的青梅竹馬

altTitles.ru: Аккуратная и красивая девушка в моей новой школе - моя подруга детства, с которой я играл,думая, что она мальчик.

altTitles.es: Una chica linda me miro en mi nueva escuela, pero resulto ser mi amiga de la infancia que solía pensar que era un chico

altTitles.en: Tenkosaki: The Neat and Pretty Girl at My New School Is a Childhood Friend of Mine Who I Thought Was a Boy
A Neat and Pretty Girl at the Transfer Destination Was a Childhood Friend Who Used to Think That She Was a Boy and Played With Her.

description.en:
I met my childhood friend again, and she had become a beautiful and innocent girl.

"It's been a while, Hayato."
"Haruki, is it?"

In the past, I used to play in the mud with my childhood friend in the countryside, and when I saw him again, there was no trace of the bratty young man I thought he was back then. Only in front of Hayato, she threw away the coat she was wearing and reacted in the same crass way she did back then. The distance between you and me has not changed.

The popular fluff webnovel is now in Manga form!
description.es: Cuando fui transferido a otra escuela una chica linda me miro, pero resulto ser mi amigo de la infancia que solía pensar que era un chico Volví a encontrar a mi amiga de la infancia y se había convertido en una chica hermosa e inocente. "Ha pasado un tiempo, Hayato." Haruki, ¿es verdad? En el pasado, solía jugar en el barro con mi amigo de la infancia en el campo, y cuando lo volví a ver, no había rastro del joven malcriado que pensé que era en ese entonces. Solo frente a Hayato, la veo detrás de la fachada que llevaba y reaccionó de la misma manera grosera que lo hizo en ese entonces. La distancia entre tú y yo no ha cambiado.
description.pt-br:
Reencontrei minha amiga de infância e ela se tornou uma garota linda e inocente.

"Já faz um tempo, Hayato."
"Haruki, não é?"

No passado, eu costumava brincar na lama com meu amigo de infância no campo e, quando o vi novamente, não havia nenhum vestígio do jovem malcriado que eu pensava que ele era naquela época. Só que na frente de Hayato ela jogou fora o casaco que vestia e reagiu da mesma forma grosseira de naquela época. A distância entre você e eu não mudou.

A popular webnovel fofa agora está em formato mangá!
